thread.title: John Williamson
thread.title_full: Speedy Registrations Co Ltd reviewed by John Williamson

author: John Williamson
title: John Williamson
text: Having found a registration I wanted I paid a deposit online to secure it, I was promptly contacted (even though it was Sunday afternoon) & given details of how to complete the transaction. A declaration was sent out for me to complete which I received by first class post on Tuesday. I signed this & popped it in the post. The required certificate of entitlement was received on Thursday morning & I simply entered my details on the DVLA website to switch my registration across. So from finding a reg I wanted to having it on my car took less than 4 days. Excellent service - I highly recommend Speedy Registrations.
